Inches (in)

Centimeters (cm)

Millimeters (mm)

Points (pt)

  • 72pts to an inch,
  • 12pts is 1/6in Picas (pc)

em-height (em)

  • 1em is defined to be the value of the font-size of the given font if font-size is 14px then 1em == 14px ex-height (ex)
  • hieght of a lowercase x in the font being used pixels (px)
